title: Out of Control
brief_description: Developed in co-operation with the Child and Adolescent Psychiatry Unit of the Prince of Wales Hospital, this video shows how to offer support to young children between the ages of 10-14 years, to say “No” to drugs that may be offered to them. It is suitable for use by parents, community organisations, church groups, counsellors and teachers.
